clusterList.phrase: recognize that the notion of humanity extends beyond the biological approach and that biology has little to say about the human person

it is true that it is perfectly possible to consider the human species an animal species like any other a species that man is learning to make himself as he already makes other animal and vegetable species

one by one science is dismantling our claims to uniqueness as a species discovering that such things as culture tool making language and even possibly self-consciousness are not the exclusive domain of homo sapiens
